/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise high into the sky, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses moving along the road. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly from the right side of the frame, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's architectural details.
